reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith explains concepts clearly, but his exams are challenging.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've ever had. Makes physics fun and engaging.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: The lectures are informative, but the homework assignments are overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Not the most engaging lecturer, and the labs are poorly organized.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is incredibly knowledgeable and always willing to help.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Great storytelling in lectures, but the exams require a lot of memorization.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is passionate about literature and brings the texts to life.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions, but his grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the workload can be heavy at times.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: The lectures are dry and hard to follow, but the textbook is helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Young is a fantastic professor who cares deeply about her students.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair grading. Dr. King encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: She knows her subject well, but her lectures can be a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is very supportive and explains complex topics in an understandable way.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Great professor with a passion for the environment. Her exams are fair.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting material, but his lectures can be difficult to follow.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Turner is an excellent professor who makes statistics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Good professor with practical business insights, but sometimes the lectures feel rushed.

reviews.subject: Nursing
reviews.review: Dr. Baker is highly knowledgeable and provides excellent hands-on training.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is a great lecturer and brings real-world experience into the classroom.
